docs.title: 欢迎访问飞马机器人开发文档 👋
docs.text:
Welcome to Feima Robotics Development Documentation

我们很高兴您能访问飞马机器人的开发文档！这里提供了全面的技术资源和指南，帮助您更好地使用我们的产品。 ✨

We're delighted to have you here! This documentation provides comprehensive technical resources and guides to help you make the most of our products.

docs.title: 选择您的语言 | Choose Your Language 🌏
docs.text:
• 中文文档 - 包含详细的中文技术文档、教程和示例
  • English Documentation - Complete technical documentation, tutorials and examples in English

docs.title: Our Products
docs.text: • SLAM SDK

docs.title: Documentation
docs.text: For detailed information about our products and solutions, please visit our documentation.

docs.title: Service Discovery
docs.text:
SLAM devices support automatic device discovery in local networks through MDNS service discovery mechanism. The service name is _slam._tcp, and the service instance name is the device's SN number.

Example

func DiscoverServices() error {
    fmt.Println("DiscoverServices")
    go func(results <-chan *zeroconf.ServiceEntry) {
        for entry := range results {
            log.Println(entry)
            if Listener != nil {
                Listener <- entry
                }
        }
        log.Println("No more entries.")
    }(entries)

    var ctx context.Context
    ctx, cancel = context.WithCancel(context.Background())
    defer cancel()
    err := zeroconf.Browse(ctx, "_slam._tcp", "local.", entries, zeroconf.SelectIPTraffic(zeroconf.IPv4))
    return err
}

docs.title: Basic Communication
docs.text:
SLAM devices support two communication methods: HTTP and WebSocket

HTTP WebSocket Address http://{DeviceIP}:19700 ws://{DeviceIP}:19700/ws Data Format Json Usage Get/Post requests JSON-RPC 2.0 Pros & Cons Pros: HTTP is easy to use, many debugging toolsCons: No bidirectional communication, cannot receive notifications Pros: Supports notifications, has connection statusCons: Debugging is less convenient than HTTP

docs.title: HTTP
docs.text:
Set Content-Type to application/json in the Header, and send requests according to the Get or Post method tag.

Request format: http://192.168.1.100:19700+method

Response format:

{
  "status": 0,
  "message": null,
  "data": resultValue
}

docs.title: WebSocket
docs.text: WebSocket connection supports bidirectional communication, the device will actively send JSON-RPC 2.0 formatted notifications.

docs.title: Sending
docs.text:
Use a JSON-RPC library or manually implement to send data in JSON-RPC 2.0 format:

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 2,
  "method": "/slam/start_work"
}

docs.title: Response
docs.text:
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 2,
  "result": resultValue
}

The resultValue depends on the return value defined in the method. Method refers to the HTTP request API or method in JSON-RPC, see SLAM_SDK.md for details.

docs.title: Notifications
docs.text: WebSocket connection will actively send JSON-RPC 2.0 notifications.

docs.title: Control Points
docs.text:
Triggered when clicking the handle record button

Example

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "OnSlamRecordPoint",
  "params": {
    "mark_idex": 0,
    "time": 0,
    "local_info": "string"
  }
}

docs.title: Battery Status
docs.text:
Supported since SDK 0.6.6 Sends every 5s when battery information is not obtained

Example

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "OnDeviceStatus",
  "params": {
    "app_version": 0,
    "sn": 0,
    "cycle_count": 0,
    "temperature": 0,
    "voltage": 0,
    "battery_vol_1": 0,
    "battery_vol_2": 0,
    "battery_vol_3": 0,
    "current": 0,
    "rsoc": 0,
    "remain_capacity": 0,
    "full_charge_capacity": 0,
    "safety_status": 0,
    "other_status": 0,
    "power_status": 0
  }
}

docs.title: Real-time Mapping
docs.text:
Supported since SDK 0.6.1 Sends real-time mapping status every second

Example

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "OnDeviceStatus",
  "params": {
    "id": 29,
    "mission_id": 2,
    "state": 1,
    "timestamp": 1739418291,
    "progress": 0
  }
}

docs.title: Real-time Point Cloud Data
docs.text: SLAM devices use TCP for point cloud transmission. Currently, there are two versions:

docs.title: Version 1
docs.text:
Point cloud data and pose data are transmitted separately, colored point clouds are not supported. Version 2 will gradually replace Version 1.

Ports

  • TCP point cloud transmission 19800
  • TCP pose transmission 19801

docs.title: Point Cloud Data Format
docs.text:
Single frame point cloud data is sent with the fixed string #FEIMA# as the end character for data separation.

typedef struct {
    float x;
    float y;
    float z;
} Point;

typedef struct {
    uint32_t id;
    double timestamp;
    uint32_t payloadLen;
} PointCloudHeader;

typedef struct {
    PointCloudHeader header;
    Point points[ ];  // len = payloadLen / sizeof(Point)
} PointCloud;

docs.title: Pose Data Format
docs.text:
Pose data is sent with the fixed string #FEIMA# as the end character for data separation.

typedef struct {
    uint32_t id;
    double timestamp;
    float ptX;  // position
    float ptY;
    float ptZ;
    float qX;  // quaternion
    float qY;
    float qZ;
    float qW;
} Pose;

docs.title: Version 2
docs.text:
Point cloud data and pose data are combined for transmission, and colored point clouds are supported.

Ports

  • TCP combined data transmission 19805

docs.title: Data Format
docs.text:
The combined data structure consists of TPackageInfo+TFrame, with the fixed string #FEIMA# as the end character for data separation.

#pragma pack(push)
#pragma pack(1)
typedef struct {
    float x;
    float y;
    float z;
    unsigned char intensity;
    unsigned char rgb[3]; // RGB
} TPointRGBI;

typedef struct {
    uint32_t id;
    double timestamp;
    uint32_t payloadLen;
} TPointCloudHeader;

typedef struct {
    TPointCloudHeader header;
    TPointRGBI *points;  // len = payloadLen / sizeof(TPointRGBI)
} TPointRGBICloud;

typedef struct {
        uint32_t id;
        double timestamp;
        double posX;  // position
        double posY;
        double posZ;
        float qX;
        float qY;
        float qZ;
        float qW;
} TDPose;

typedef struct {
        TDPose pose;
        TPointRGBICloud cloud;
} TFrame;

typedef struct {
    uint16_t version;
} TPackageInfo;

#pragma pack(pop)

docs.title: Bluetooth
docs.text: For SLAM devices that support Bluetooth LE, WiFi configuration can be performed through Bluetooth LE.

docs.title: Device Information
docs.text:
• Bluetooth Name: Device SN
  • Encoding: UTF8

docs.title: Connection Method
docs.text: Connect to the device SN through BLE protocol.

docs.title: Connect to WiFi
docs.text:
Characteristic UUID Properties WiFi setting 00006a04-0000-1000-8000-00805f9b34fb withoutResponse

Write

ssid=$ssid passwd=$password

docs.title: WiFi Connection History
docs.text:
Characteristic UUID Properties WiFi history 00006a06-0000-1000-8000-00805f9b34fb withoutResponse

Read

network id / ssid / bssid / flags
0 SLAM_AP any     [CURRENT]

Save Settings

SAVE_CONFIG

docs.title: 我们的产品
docs.text: • SLAM SDK

docs.title: 文档
docs.text: 有关我们产品和解决方案的详细信息，请访问我们的文档。

docs.title: 服务发现
docs.text:
SLAM 设备通过 MDNS 服务发现机制支持在局域网中自动发现设备。该服务的名称为 _slam._tcp，服务实例名称为设备的 SN 号。

示例

func DiscoverServices() error {
    fmt.Println("DiscoverServices")
    go func(results <-chan *zeroconf.ServiceEntry) {
        for entry := range results {
            log.Println(entry)
            if Listener != nil {
                Listener <- entry
                }
        }
        log.Println("No more entries.")
    }(entries)

    var ctx context.Context
    ctx, cancel = context.WithCancel(context.Background())
    defer cancel()
    err := zeroconf.Browse(ctx, "_slam._tcp", "local.", entries, zeroconf.SelectIPTraffic(zeroconf.IPv4))
    return err
}

docs.title: 基本通讯
docs.text:
SLAM 设备支持HTTP/WebSocket两种通讯方式

HTTP WebSocket 地址 http://{DeviceIP}:19700 ws://{DeviceIP}:19700/ws 数据格式 Json 使用 Get/Post请求 JSON-RPC 2.0 优缺点 优点：http易于使用，调试工具多缺点：非双向通讯，无法获取通知 优点：支持接收通知，有连接状态缺点：调试不如HTTP方便

docs.title: HTTP
docs.text:
Header中设置Content-Type为application/json，根据method的Get或者Post标签发送请求.

请求格式为http://192.168.1.100:19700+method

响应格式为：

{
  "status": 0,
  "message": null,
  "data": resultValue
}

docs.title: WebSocket
docs.text: WebSocket连接支持双向通讯，设备会主动下发JSON-RPC 2.0格式的通知。

docs.title: 发送
docs.text:
使用JsonRPC库或手动实现，发送JSON-RPC 2.0格式的数据：

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 2,
  "method": "/slam/start_work"
}

docs.title: 返回
docs.text:
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 2,
  "result": resultValue
}

resultValue具体取决于method中定义的返回值。 Method HTTP请求的API，或JSON-RPC中的method，具体查看SLAM_SDK.md

docs.title: 通知
docs.text: WebSocket连接会主动发送JSON-RPC2.0通知

docs.title: 控制点
docs.text:
当点击手柄记录点按钮时触发

示例

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "OnSlamRecordPoint",
  "params": {
    "mark_idex": 0,
    "time": 0,
    "local_info": "string"
  }
}

docs.title: 电池状态
docs.text:
SDK0.6.6开始支持 未获取电量信息时，5s发送一次

示例

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "OnDeviceStatus",
  "params": {
    "app_version": 0,
    "sn": 0,
    "cycle_count": 0,
    "temperature": 0,
    "voltage": 0,
    "battery_vol_1": 0,
    "battery_vol_2": 0,
    "battery_vol_3": 0,
    "current": 0,
    "rsoc": 0,
    "remain_capacity": 0,
    "full_charge_capacity": 0,
    "safety_status": 0,
    "other_status": 0,
    "power_status": 0
  }
}

docs.title: 实时建图
docs.text:
SDK0.6.1开始支持 每秒发送实时建图状态

示例

{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "OnDeviceStatus",
  "params": {
    "id": 29,
    "mission_id": 2,
    "state": 1,
    "timestamp": 1739418291,
    "progress": 0
  }
}

docs.title: 实时点云数据
docs.text: SLAM设备点云使用TCP传输，目前存在2个版本：

docs.title: 版本1
docs.text:
点云数据和姿态数据分开传输，不支持赋色点云，版本2将逐渐替代版本1

端口

  • TCP点云传输 19800
  • TCP位姿传输 19801

docs.title: 点云数据格式
docs.text:
单帧点云数据发送，结尾以#FEIMA#固定字符为结束字符，用于数据分隔。

typedef struct {
    float x;
    float y;
    float z;
} Point;

typedef struct {
    uint32_t id;
    double timestamp;
    uint32_t payloadLen;
} PointCloudHeader;

typedef struct {
    PointCloudHeader header;
    Point points[ ];  // len = payloadLen / sizeof(Point)
} PointCloud;

docs.title: 位置姿态数据格式
docs.text:
位置姿态数据发送，结尾以#FEIMA#固定字符为结束字符，用于数据分隔。

typedef struct {
    uint32_t id;
    double timestamp;
    float ptX;  // position
    float ptY;
    float ptZ;
    float qX;  // quaternion
    float qY;
    float qZ;
    float qW;
} Pose;

docs.title: 版本2
docs.text:
点云数据和姿态数据组合传输，支持赋色点云

端口

  • 19805 TCP组合数据传输

docs.title: 数据格式
docs.text:
组合数结构为TPackageInfo+TFrame，#FEIMA#固定字符为结束字符，用于数据分隔。

#pragma pack(push)
#pragma pack(1)
typedef struct {
    float x;
    float y;
    float z;
    unsigned char intensity;
    unsigned char rgb[3]; // RGB
} TPointRGBI;

typedef struct {
    uint32_t id;
    double timestamp;
    uint32_t payloadLen;
} TPointCloudHeader;

typedef struct {
    TPointCloudHeader header;
    TPointRGBI *points;  // len = payloadLen / sizeof(TPointRGBI)
} TPointRGBICloud;

typedef struct {
        uint32_t id;
        double timestamp;
        double posX;  // position
        double posY;
        double posZ;
        float qX;
        float qY;
        float qZ;
        float qW;
} TDPose;

typedef struct {
        TDPose pose;
        TPointRGBICloud cloud;
} TFrame;

typedef struct {
    uint16_t version;
} TPackageInfo;

#pragma pack(pop)

docs.title: 蓝牙
docs.text: 对于支持Bluetooth LE的SLAM设备，可通过Bluetooth LE对设备进行WiFi配置。

docs.title: 设备信息

• 蓝牙名称：设备SN
  • 编解码：UTF8

docs.title: 连接方式
docs.text: 通过BLE协议连接到设备SN

docs.title: 连接WiFi

docs.title: SLAM HTTP API
docs.text:
Base URLs:

  • http://{{DeviceIP}}:19700

docs.title: GET 获取版本信息
docs.text:
GET /slam/get_version

返回示例

200 Response

{
  "status": 0,
  "message": null,
  "data": {}
}

docs.title: 返回结果
docs.text: 状态码 状态码含义 说明 数据模型 200 OK none Inline

docs.title: 返回数据结构
docs.text:
状态码 200

名称 类型 必选 约束 中文名 说明 » status integer true none 0 success, 1 failed » message null true none error message » data object true none none

docs.title: GET 同步设备时间
docs.text: GET /slam/sync_time

docs.title: 请求参数
返回结果
docs.text: 状态码 状态码含义 说明 数据模型 200 OK none BaseResult

docs.title: GET 获取设备时间

GET /slam/get_sys_time

返回示例

  "timestamp": 0,
  "timezone": "string",
  "offset": 0
}

docs.title: 返回结果

docs.title: GET 设置相机状态
docs.text: GET /slam2000/set_camera_configs

docs.title: 请求参数
docs.text: 名称 位置 类型 必选 说明 controlType query integer 是 1:赋色镜头；2，光学镜头 camType query integer 是 camSet                    params param query integer 否 camSet                    params

docs.title: 详细说明
docs.text:
camType: camSet params 1，开启/关闭摄像头； 0:关闭；1：开启 2，抓拍； 无 3，开启/关闭录像模式； 0:关闭；1：开启 4，开启/关闭共享数据； 0:关闭；1：开启 5，开启/关闭共享YUV数据； 0:关闭；1：开启 6，开启/关闭连拍模式； 0:关闭；1：开启 7，设置曝光参数 0：关闭; 1：50hz; 2：60hz 8，拍照间隔 1秒多少张照片

param: camSet params 1，开启/关闭摄像头； 0:关闭；1：开启 2，抓拍； 无 3，开启/关闭录像模式； 0:关闭；1：开启 4，开启/关闭共享数据； 0:关闭；1：开启 5，开启/关闭共享YUV数据； 0:关闭；1：开启 6，开启/关闭连拍模式； 0:关闭；1：开启 7，设置曝光参数 0：关闭; 1：50hz; 2：60hz 8，拍照间隔 1秒多少张照片

返回示例

200 Response

{
  "status": 0,
  "message": null
}

docs.title: GET 配置Wi-Fi

docs.title: 请求参数
